mainHero.title: Google Maps Mentor
mainHero.subtitle: Travel like a pro!
mainHero.description: Location suggestions to harness the full potential of Google Maps for travel, everyday life and business needs.

items.title: Personalized Travel
items.description: Add collections of recommended locations to your Google Maps. Discover hidden gems & top attractions! Whether you are seeking the best local spots or planning your next adventure. To learn more or to request your own map, email us with the label of the map. We can't wait to help you explore!

items.title: Travelers - Local Experts
items.description: Are you an expert in your area, with in-depth knowledge of the best places to visit, dine or explore? We are looking for passionate locals and travel enthusiasts to partner with us in creating custom maps for people eager to discover new adventures. If you have a talent for uncovering hidden gems and want to share your expertise through personalized maps, we'd love to hear from you! Contact us to join our team and help others explore your favorite places.

features.title: Sell your custom maps!
features.subtitle: Featured map lists on Google Maps
features.description: Google Maps Lists are a feature that allows users to create and manage collections of saved locations within the Google Maps application. This functionality serves as a powerful tool for organizing and sharing locations effectively. Whether for personal use or collaborative planning, this feature enhances how users interact with their surroundings while providing easy access to curated recommendations.

items.name: Favorites List
items.description: Users can create personalized lists to save locations based on their preferences, such as favorite restaurants or places to visit on a trip. Each custom list can be named and described, allowing for tailored organization.

items.name: Hiking Trails List
items.description: Explore amazing trails, stunning views, and hidden spots. Whether you're seeking a relaxing walk or an adventurous hike, there's something for everyone. Make it easy for planning fun experiences.

items.name: Desserts List
items.description: Create a collection of must-try treats that will delight your taste buds! Indulge in local delicacies. This list highlights the top dessert spots to satisfy your sweet cravings while celebrating local flavors.

items.name: Brunch List
items.description: Elevate your brunch game, discover charming cafes and trendy restaurants serving up mouthwatering dishes, from fluffy pancakes and savory egg dishes to refreshing mimosas and artisanal coffee.
